Entry: Black people want to steal our land/farms/properties
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "黑人想偷走我们的土地/农场/财产"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "السود يريدون سرقة أرضنا/مزارعنا/ممتلكاتنا"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los negros quieren robarnos nuestras tierras/granjas/propiedades"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Schwarze wollen unser Land, unsere Farmen und unseren Besitz stehlen."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Черные люди хотят украсть наши земли/фермы/собственность"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Siyahlar topraklarımızı/çiftliklerimizi/mülklerimizi çalmak istiyor"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os negros querem roubar nossas terras/fazendas/propriedades"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "黑人想竊取我們的土地/農場/財產"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "काले लोग हमारी भूमि/खेतों/गुणों को चुराना चाहते हैं"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "سیاهپوستان می خواهند زمین/مزارع/املاک ما را به سرقت بکشند"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Swart mense wil ons land/plase/eiendomme steel"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Abantu abamnyama bafuna ukweba umhlaba wethu / amapulazi / izakhiwo"}]

Entry: Crime is high because of too many foreigners
